entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Go to definition opens metadata instead of source file for project reference #75480
  • Skipping EE integration tests causes many failures in integration test run #75478
  • Drag a file in a different folder causes unwanted code and formatting changes #75463

Closed

  • "New Line" options are not taking effect in VS 2022 Community (Version 17.12.0 Preview 1.0) #75393
    17.12 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache checksum computation at an collection-element level #75479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Skip EE integration tests #75477
    Blocked
  • Revert "Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process"" #75476
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Update "first-class Span" feature status #75474
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report obsolete diagnostics on `System.Index` and `System.Range` #75473
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.11] Merge from internal 17.11 #75472
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.10] Merge from internal 17.10 #75471
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.8] Merge from internal 17.8 #75468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery for `with` expression statement #75466
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update to net9.0 #75465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Unify collection expression cycle handling #75464
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve quick info on `using` keyword #75462
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Field-backed properties: [field:] should not be considered a backing field reference #75461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Navigate to the mapped span when navigating to a mapped file #75460
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fixing the OOM in scripting #75372
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix null ref in document-highlights #75475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Have find references navigate to a position instead of a span #75418
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge "first-class Span types" feature into main #74732
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types, Next
  • Fix updating solution fallback options #75417
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Only provide fallback options for host analyzers #75317
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Handle span conversions in `is` operator #75413
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Updated

  • Fix circularity issue with binding const local #75371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated #75423
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #74982
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • WIP: Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Report LSP loading telemetry #75402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add more first-class Span tests #75414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Report diagnostics from `TryFindDisposePatternMethod` when binding `foreach` loop #75422
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
